==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ろん|がい}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/rongwai/}} → {{IPAchar|/rongai/}}

Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ろんがい}} compound {{m|zh|論外|tr=lwon<sup>H</sup> ngwaj<sup>H</sup>|lit=discussion + outside}}.

Alternately, may be a Japanese coinage from {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived elements, as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ろんがい|論|tr1=ron|t1=argument; theory|外|tr2=gai|t2=outside}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ろんがい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=1|acc2_ref=DJR}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|ろんがい|hhira=ろんぐわい}}

# [[irrelevant]], [[beside the point]], [[out of the question]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|ろんがい}}

=====Usage notes=====
Listed explicitly in some dictionaries<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> as a ''-na'' type adjective. Also used as a noun followed by particle {{ja-r|の}} to modify other nouns.<ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ろんがい|hhira=ろんぐわい}}

# something [[outside]] the [[scope]] of [[discussion]], something that is [[off-topic]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''論外'''の意見|'''ろんがい''' の いけん|an opinion that is '''off-topic''', an '''irrelevant''' opinion}}
